ygData.subject: Competing storylines
ygData.msgSnippet: Why don t we show Mark over to the glad-tourny group, where we need a storyline anyway? I was planning on doing a plot with religions, but I m pretty burned

Why don't we show Mark over to the glad-tourny group, where we need a 
storyline anyway? I was planning on doing a plot with religions, but 
I'm pretty burned out these days, and perhaps should only advise... 
the only problem might be Mark's disapproval with linear storylines; 
the tournament would pretty much have to be the same, no matter which 
side you're on... 
    -Tevildo, Prince of Cats.
